transcript.title: AUSTRALIAN CARE WORKERS
transcript.content:
Yesterday I wrote to the President of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia,

Slobodan Milosevic, seeking the immediate release of the two detained

CARE Australia workers, Steve Pratt and Peter Wallace.

The Australian government remains deeply concerned at the continued

detention of these two men who at all times have been humanitarian

aid workers solely committed to the relief of human suffering.

The Chairman of CARE Australia, the Rt Hon Malcolm Fraser, is returning

to Yugoslavia today. In my letter, I asked President Milosevic if

he would personally receive Mr Fraser, who is the government's

special envoy in relation to seeking the release of Steve Pratt and

Peter Wallace, in connection with the government's desire to

free the two CARE workers.
